mapper.select:
select t.id, t.task_id, t.duration, t.create_time, t.num_threads, t.result, c.id as case_id,c.name as jmeter_case, lu.username as creator from task t left join `case` c on c.id = t.jmeter_case left join lin_user lu on lu.id = t.creator where t.delete_time is null and t.result != 0
and t.task_id like CONCAT('%', #{taskId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
and c.name like CONCAT('%', #{jmeterCase,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
and t.result = #{result}
and date_format(t.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') >= #{startTime}
and #{endTime} >= date_format(t.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
order by t.create_time desc

select sum(t.duration) from task t where t.delete_time is null and t.result = 1
and t.task_id like CONCAT('%', #{taskId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
